prompts: Create a majestic bird Pokemon that radiates flames and has fiery wings.
Imagine a legendary fire-type Pokemon with bright orange feathers and a long beak.
Design a mythical creature that soars through the sky, enveloped in flames.
Show me a powerful Pokemon with wings made of fire and a fierce appearance.
Generate a unique bird Pokemon that glows with heat and has a golden body.
Make a stunning fire and flying-type Pokemon that embodies the essence of a phoenix.
Give me a fiery bird Pokemon that leaves trails of fire in its wake.
